title: A Growing Desire: A Breast Expansion Tale
description: Jewel is in trouble. She's forgotten that today is the anniversary of when she and her wife, Diana, first dated, and all she can think about is eating some of Diana's delicious, alluring pumpkin pie. Of course, she'd still be in BIG trouble even if she had remembered. Huge developments and massive changes are in store for Diana's precious little gem. Find out how much trouble she gets into!
author: Beatrice Evenmorne
